fullText:
Astral Enmity

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Deva, avenger, oath of enmity power
Benefit: If you use your memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power to increase an attack roll against your oath of enmity target, you deal extra damage equal to the bonus gained from the racial power.

Published in Divine Power, page(s) 130.
name: Astral Enmity
